FBS_GUARD (ENUM)
FBS_GUARD (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_GUARD :
Definition of SF_Guard function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The FUNCTION block is NOT active (initial state).
INIT
16#8001
Function block has been activated.
NORMAL
16#8000
Safety guard closed and Safe state acknowledged.
OPEN_START
16#8802
Complete switching sequence required.
WAIT_FOR_RESET
16#8402
Waiting for rising trigger at Reset.
GUARD_OPENED
16#8804
Guard completely opened.
WAIT_FOR_SWITCH2
16#8806
S_GuardSwitch1 has been switched to TRUE - waiting for
S_GuardSwitch2; discrepancy timer started.
WAIT_FOR_SWITCH1
16#8808
S_GuardSwitch2 has been switched to TRUE - waiting for
S_GuardSwitch1; discrepancy timer started.
GUARD_CLOSED
16#8002
Guard closed. Waiting for Reset, if S_AutoReset = FALSE.
ERR_RESET
16#C001
Static reset detected in state âWait for Resetâ, 16#8402.
ERR_DISC_TIME_1
16#C010
DiscrepancyTime elapsed in state âWait for GuardSwitch 2â,
16#8806.
ERR_DISC_TIME_2
16#C020
DiscrepancyTime elapsed in state âWait for GuardSwitch 1â,
16#8808.

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The FUNCTION block is NOT active (initial state).

rows.Name: NORMAL
rows.Comment: Safety guard closed and Safe state acknowledged.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET
rows.Comment: Waiting for rising trigger at Reset.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_SWITCH2
rows.Comment:
S_GuardSwitch1 has been switched to TRUE - waiting for
S_GuardSwitch2; discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_SWITCH1
rows.Comment:
S_GuardSwitch2 has been switched to TRUE - waiting for
S_GuardSwitch1; discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: GUARD_CLOSED
rows.Comment: Guard closed. Waiting for Reset, if S_AutoReset = FALSE.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET
rows.Comment: Static reset detected in state âWait for Resetâ, 16#8402.

rows.Name: ERR_DISC_TIME_1
rows.Comment:
DiscrepancyTime elapsed in state âWait for GuardSwitch 2â,
16#8806.

rows.Name: ERR_DISC_TIME_2
rows.Comment:
DiscrepancyTime elapsed in state âWait for GuardSwitch 1â,
16#8808.
